item.title: Ronnie add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ronnie add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ronnie add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Yes: I am a dreamer. For a dreamer is one who can only find his way by moonlight, and his punishment is that he sees the dawn before the rest of the world." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ronnie add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "Those who dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Ronnie add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "If ever there is tomorrow when we're not together... there is something you must always remember. You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think. But the most important thing is, even if we're apart... I'll always be with you." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Ronnie add a quote by Victor Hugo
item.description: "What Is Love? I have met in the streets a very poor young man who was in love. His hat was old, his coat worn, the water passed through his shoes and the stars through his soul" -- Victor Hugo

item.title: Ronnie add a quote by Victor Hugo
item.description: "No army can withstand the strength of an idea whose time has come." -- Victor Hugo

item.title: Ronnie add a quote by Victor Hugo
item.description: "Nothing makes a man so adventurous as an empty pocket." -- Victor Hugo

item.title: Ronnie add a quote by Victor Hugo
item.description: "To learn to read is to light a fire; every syllable that is spelled out is a spark." -- Victor Hugo

item.title: Ronnie add a quote by George Harrison
item.description: "If you don't know where you're going, any road'll take you there" -- George Harrison

item.title: Ronnie add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The only way to get rid of temptation is to yield to it." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ronnie add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Who, being loved, is poor?" -- Oscar Wilde
